trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were 2 other sightings in Abilene on or around February 15th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWatch the skies tonight, between 6:45pm and 8pm. Wont be dissapointed. Watched them last nigth for 20 minutes. They seem to come and go for days at a time. Haven't seen them in months, when they show up they show up for several days in a row. If you haven't seen them yet you'll be amazed, I promise. Been watching these odd lights for 3 years now. Please watch the skies.
